ValidationRule.description: US-0009871 - [Refurb] Send Click Agreements to Contract Sellers
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Refurbished", ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Contract Send"), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Draft"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"In Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Pending Approval")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: BU Approved Contracts only can be sent to Seller.
